Thanks @chenliu0831 . 

Can you tell more details about the mount path for your container? Like `/usr/local/cuda/lib64/libcuda*` or `/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.*`? We're using `docker` instead of `nvidia-docker` and need to mount all the dependent `.so` files.
